item.title: Kotlin ‚ù§Ô∏è Data Science? (Part 1)
item.description: A few days ago, I was invited to give a talk at the Munich Kotlin Users Group meetup (check out my slides here) For quite some time, I have had an idea to promote Kotlin as the missing link between software engineering and Data Science. DuringKotlinConf 2018, I had the chance and the privilege to meet a couple of amazing people, whose talks only helped confirm my thoughts. Mathematical Modeling with Kotlin | Thomas Nield
A view to live for! üòç Sendlinger Tor | Munich
